detectors.description:
Reentrancy in YFVDevRewards.burnRewards(uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#426-433):
	External calls:
	- yfv.mint(address(this),amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#430)
	- yfv.burn(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#431)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardBurn(amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#432)

detectors.description:
Reentrancy in YFVDevRewards.claimRewards() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#416-424):
	External calls:
	- yfv.mint(msg.sender,reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#420)
	- vUSD.mint(msg.sender,reward.div(vUSD_REWARD_FRACTION_RATE)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#421)
	- vETH.mint(msg.sender,reward.div(vETH_REWARD_FRACTION_RATE)) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#422)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- RewardPaid(reward) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#423)

detectors.description:

	- block.timestamp >= endtime (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/YFVDevRewards.sol#408)
